channel.title: CVE Feed for Gallagher -- Gallagher Controller 6000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Gallagher -- Gallagher Controller 6000

item.title: CVE-2022-26078|2024-08-03T04:56:37.504Z -- gallagher -- gallagher%20controller%206000
item.description: Gallagher Controller 6000 is vulnerable to a Denial of Service attack via conflicting ARP packets with a duplicate IP address. This issue affects: Gallagher Gallagher Controller 6000 vCR8.60 versions prior to 220303a; vCR8.50 versions prior to 220303a; vCR8.40 versions prior to 220303a; vCR8.30 versions prior to 220303a.
